name: cubicle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small space with walls or curtains around it, that is separate from the rest of a room and where you can be private when taking clothes off, etc.: a shower cubicle I was getting undressed in one of the cubicles.
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small room, often only large enough for one person, within a larger room or area: a work cubicle
Add to word list
Add to word list
WORKPLACE a small office space that is made by putting up low walls in a larger room: Rather than preside from an office, she sits in a cubicle among her employees. They work in cubicles in an open-plan office.
